FROM node:argon

RUN mkdir -p /app/endpoints
WORKDIR /app

COPY package.json /app/package.json
COPY bookstore.js /app/bookstore.js
COPY swagger.json /app/swagger.json
COPY README.md /app/README.md
COPY service.json /app/endpoints/service.json

RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

EXPOSE 8080
VOLUME /app

CMD [ "npm", "start" ]
